scripts.prestart: node -e "if (!require('fs').existsSync('./frontend/package.json')) { console.error('ERROR: frontend/package.json is missing!'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && (if exist mvnw.cmd (mvnw.cmd spring-boot:run) else (mvn spring-boot:run))
scripts.start:frontend: wait-on http://localhost:8080/actuator/health -t 60000 && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && (if exist mvnw.cmd (mvnw.cmd clean package -DskipTests) else (mvn clean package -DskipTests))
